Drivers and Owner Operators: We Want You

Put yourself in the driver’s seat of your career with Cusmir Express. Join our rapidly growing team of transportation experts. We have various open positions and we’re always looking for the best of the best.

With Cusmir Express you will get the desired amount of miles as we move freight 24 hours a day, 365 days a year from and to any point within the United States (48 States).
